text: Digau Sheba mo Dedan mo digau huihui goloo mai Spain ga heeu adu gi di goe, ‘Goe gu hagadagabuli mai dau llongo dauwa gaa hai gi digaula bolo goe gaa oho, gaa kae nia goloo digaula? Goe e hagamaanadu bolo goe gaa kae nia silber mono goolo, mono manu mo nadau gowaa, ga hagatanga gaa hana mo au goloo aalaa?’”
